lead_paragraph: REED--Gordon Peter Q.,of Palm Beach, Florida died peacefully at home Saturday, June 25, 2016. He was born November 1, 1926, the son of Verner Z. and Gladys Reed. He attended Aiken Preparatory School, the Fay School and graduated from Milton Academy and Harvard College. He was a private in the Marine Corps in World War II. He is survived by his wife Polly and four children: Jessie Kendall, Alison Verner Reed, Gordon Peter Reed, Jr., Benjamin Dean Reed and step daughter Diane C. Pickering: three grandchildren, Ashley Campsie, Gordon Peter Reed III, Emily Reed and two great-grandchildren Cameron Campsie and Olivia Campsie. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  REED, GORDON PETER Q.
